tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to timing attacks due to the use of non-constant-time string comparison in `Notification::verifyNotification`, which allows attackers to potentially infer valid values through response time measurements.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `multisafepay/php-sdk` library to the patch version.
